name: ffdmd
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0

stmt.origin: simpld(w0, wf(c0, cdm(c0), c1), wss(cdm(c0), c2))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wf(c0, cdm(c0), c1))
-| wi(w0, wa(wf(c0, cdm(c0), c1), wss(cdm(c0), c2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wf(c0, cdm(c0), c1))
-| wi(w0, wa(wf(c0, cdm(c0), c1), wss(cdm(c0), c2)))

stmt.origin: syl(w0, wa(wf(c0, cdm(c0), c1), wss(cdm(c0), c2)), wf(c0, c2, c1))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wa(wf(c0, cdm(c0), c1), wss(cdm(c0), c2)))
-| wi(w0, wf(c0, c2, c1))
-| wi(wf(c0, c2, c1), wa(wf(c0, cdm(c0), c1), wss(cdm(c0), c2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wf(c0, cdm(c0), c1))
-| wi(w0, wf(c0, c2, c1))
-| wi(wf(c0, c2, c1), wa(wf(c0, cdm(c0), c1), wss(cdm(c0), c2)))

body.origin: |- wi(wf(c0, c2, c1), wa(wf(c0, cdm(c0), c1), wss(cdm(c0), c2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wf(c0, cdm(c0), c1))
-| wi(w0, wf(c0, c2, c1))

comment: The domain of a function. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 26-Jun-2021.)
